5c15cfbf-f388-432b-ae13-212d494dfc30.body:
In this step, we generate a unique code for the opportunity integration.

Each opportunity must have a different code
5c15cfbf-f388-432b-ae13-212d494dfc30.title: Opportunity Code Generation

a2ac18e0-e654-4358-ad45-019c141e7bcb.body:
To register an opportunity, we need some codes:


cCodIntOp: Opportunity integration code.
cDesOp: Opportunity description.
nCodContato: Contact code.
nCodSolucao: Solution code.
nCodOrigem: Source code.
nCodConta: Account code.
nCodVendedor: Seller code.
a2ac18e0-e654-4358-ad45-019c141e7bcb.title: Attention

actions.body:
Error including contact

UUID: @contact.uuid 

Name: @contact.name 

Extra: @webhook.extra
actions.subject: Error including Opportunity Omie - @globals.nome_da_empresa

0fbdcf20-b3f2-425a-81b6-352b8d6542c1.body: The Leads Capture - Omie flow begins, which will capture name, phone number and email and create the contact and opportunity in Omie.
0fbdcf20-b3f2-425a-81b6-352b8d6542c1.title: Not customer

661c29b4-542c-4c75-938d-c722aba3bd24.body: Here we send a welcome message that can be customized. Currently we use global variables to send the name of the company and the bot.
661c29b4-542c-4c75-938d-c722aba3bd24.title: Welcome

actions.text:
Hello, I'm @globals.nome_do_bot, the support assistant from @globals.nome_da_empresa 😊

Today is a special day...

190d66d0-2d0e-492d-872d-03460a5ddf18.body: Here we add the user to the Registered Lead group and remove them from the Unregistered Lead group
190d66d0-2d0e-492d-872d-03460a5ddf18.title: Add to a group

268bd6c6-dc15-47d1-a299-9d1a52a39928.body: Here we add the user to the Unregistered Lead group and remove them from the Registered Lead group
268bd6c6-dc15-47d1-a299-9d1a52a39928.title: Add to a group

43331efc-86a5-4b90-a101-5e40d8f5afca.body: Here we check if the contact already exists in Omie by searching for the email, if so, we save the nCod and cCodInt.
43331efc-86a5-4b90-a101-5e40d8f5afca.title: Check Contact

815c3486-660c-4b27-92ef-e3745455a036.body: Here we include the contact in Omie, passing name, phone and email.
815c3486-660c-4b27-92ef-e3745455a036.title: Include Contact

9292f7cb-4062-453f-a3eb-1b8f111e9ff9.body: Here we generate a unique integration code for the lead
9292f7cb-4062-453f-a3eb-1b8f111e9ff9.title: Generate Lead Integration Code

ccd2c621-21b0-464f-9d80-594e8324eddb.body: Add your email to receive notifications whenever a failure occurs
ccd2c621-21b0-464f-9d80-594e8324eddb.title: Send Email

e6ae774b-ac9b-4506-b9bc-d464ec700237.body: Here we save the contact creation information
e6ae774b-ac9b-4506-b9bc-d464ec700237.title: Update Contact

e7491a8e-28ca-47a3-aa87-d7a56a9df179.body: Here we make a double check if the contact inclusion fails. We check if the contact already exists by searching for the contact name
e7491a8e-28ca-47a3-aa87-d7a56a9df179.title: Double Check

ff1553a1-7b6e-4e7f-a088-4413facd0850.body: Add your email to receive notifications whenever a failure occurs
ff1553a1-7b6e-4e7f-a088-4413facd0850.title: Send Email

arguments: ERROR: Contact already exists for Integration Code
ERROR: Contact already exists for Integration Code
ERROR: Contact already exists for Integration Code

actions.body:
Error including contact

UUID: @contact.uuid 

Name: @contact.name 

Extra: @webhook.extra
actions.subject: Error including contact OMIE - @globals.nome_da_empresa
Error searching contact already exists Omie - @globals.nome_da_empresa

3981ad9d-3de2-4bdc-a2ba-2c91c09ec24e.body: Here we send a message for the case when the user types "No"
3981ad9d-3de2-4bdc-a2ba-2c91c09ec24e.title: Send message

6de238a2-56d2-454c-8326-e9ada2498d0f.body:
We add the user's email in the URN email. This URN is the channel in which the user can be contacted.

OBS: You actively send emails if the user has the URN email
6de238a2-56d2-454c-8326-e9ada2498d0f.title: Add URN

6f578108-e997-41db-9a1c-0c2d07eaa7eb.body:
The No Response category is used when the flow continues without the user answering the question. It is usually used to avoid the user being stuck in a question.

In addition, we add the user to the "Conversation closed" group because before sending another message or entering another flow, we can check if the user is in that group and avoid sending messages
6f578108-e997-41db-9a1c-0c2d07eaa7eb.title: No response category

74277e9b-662a-4587-8582-26c3377cc96d.body: We also save the Email field in the contact. This data can be seen in the details of each contact and can be used in any message flow since the information is being saved in the contact and not in a specific message flow.
74277e9b-662a-4587-8582-26c3377cc96d.title: Update contact

da002ce3-4e18-4a22-9b36-96a48f982a3e.body:
Here we check that the user did not enter an email and ask if they can inform it and give the option of Sim and Não. 

It is important to remember that in this step, if the user has already responded with their email, we will be able to detect it, since all the rules are in the same card "Wait for response".
da002ce3-4e18-4a22-9b36-96a48f982a3e.title: Send message

e28fcce8-0b2d-4fc5-83d8-add72e8a1821.body:
Here we wait for the user's response and use the "has an email" rule. 

We also use the rules of Sim and Não to check if the user wants or does not want to inform the email.
e28fcce8-0b2d-4fc5-83d8-add72e8a1821.title: Wait for response

f279df0d-d508-4321-98b7-5d1f3d3c8c56.body: Here we ask the user for their email. You can personalize this message to your liking
f279df0d-d508-4321-98b7-5d1f3d3c8c56.title: Send message

actions.text: Due to lack of response, I ended this conversation. But when you want, just talk to me 😉
Understood, but in this case we need this information to contact you.
This is very important information for us! Can you tell us?

08f7ed6b-1062-46af-b107-ada9320e4d8d.body:
The No Response category is used when the flow continues without the user answering the question. It is usually used to avoid leaving the user stuck in a question.

In addition, we add the user to the "Conversation closed" group so that before sending another message or entering another flow, we can check if the user is in that group and avoid sending messages.
08f7ed6b-1062-46af-b107-ada9320e4d8d.title: No Response Category

13885c2e-3797-447e-996b-a538ec066b2b.body: Here we check the error counter. If it's still 0, we categorize it as "First error" and handle it accordingly. If it's the second error, the user goes through the Other category.
13885c2e-3797-447e-996b-a538ec066b2b.title: Split by Run Result

3355ec0f-ea5a-4121-9c7a-25f9bd08d558.body:
We wait for the user's response.

Remember that you can click on the option "Continue when there is no response..." and choose the time you want to wait.

Inside the "Wait for response" card, we create a rule using REGEX to know if the user entered the number in the correct format. If necessary, you can add other rules of "matches regex".
3355ec0f-ea5a-4121-9c7a-25f9bd08d558.title: Wait for Response

348999b7-47f6-4357-ab9d-801bef51ada4.body:
If the user enters the number incorrectly for a second time, we send an email to the responsible for the sector and let them proceed, as it may be a number from another country, etc.

You can edit the email to receive a signal when any user passes through this scenario.

After sending the email, we save the phone and let the user proceed to the next flow.
348999b7-47f6-4357-ab9d-801bef51ada4.title: Send Email

5372c1d7-3a93-46ea-931f-3f1418de89a0.body: If it's the first error of the user but their message has a number, we inform that we need a certain format. However, if it doesn't have a number, we send a different message.
5372c1d7-3a93-46ea-931f-3f1418de89a0.title: Split by Expression

58129c8a-2535-46bb-9cbf-ba607b665791.body: Here we ask the user for their phone number showing the format accepted by REGEX
58129c8a-2535-46bb-9cbf-ba607b665791.title: Send Message

affaf933-fe99-47c8-b6b2-4c67c0390c46.body:
Here we save +1 in the error counter. This will serve to verify whether it is or is not the first time the user has entered the wrong number format desired.

If the user enters the number incorrectly for a second time, we send an email to the responsible for the sector and let them proceed.
affaf933-fe99-47c8-b6b2-4c67c0390c46.title: Save Run Result

caa6bf9a-787c-4c12-b38f-7bd2c6d8b9d9.body: Here we save a result called error counter. It will always be saved as 0 at the beginning of the message flow and we will use it later to verify if the user entered a number format different from the expected one.
caa6bf9a-787c-4c12-b38f-7bd2c6d8b9d9.title: Save Run Result

f4981608-a886-4f03-98bd-c02234ec92ae.body: Here we save the phone number entered in the Telefone contact field so that the data is saved in the contact and not just in the message flow.
f4981608-a886-4f03-98bd-c02234ec92ae.title: Update Contact

actions.text: Can I save your Whatsapp @(replace(urns.whatsapp, "whatsapp:", "")) as your main contact?

Could you tell me your phone number with the DDD? 

_In this format (DD) 9xxxx-xxxx_
Due to lack of response, I closed this conversation. But if you want, you can talk to me 😉
Due to lack of response, I closed this conversation. But if you want, you can talk to me 😉

actions.body:
Client with a different number from the format - Chatbot

Number informed in the Chatbot: @results.phone.value

Name: @contact.name

UUID: @contact.uuid
actions.subject: User with a different number from the format - Chatbot

actions.text: Then @(title(contact.first_name)), I need a valid number! Please, type your number below. (DD) 9xxxx-xxxx
I need this information in case I need to contact you 😔

120ac629-cc94-49b3-913f-98cb60f36419.body:
The "Send message" card is used to send messages to the user through a channel.

This message can be personalized, for example, asking for the person's preferred name.
120ac629-cc94-49b3-913f-98cb60f36419.title: Send message

63fee139-f00e-4b5a-b4a8-935535ce09a8.body:
Here we check if the user is in the "Informed Name" group, because if they are, it's because they have already informed their name previously, as the user is only added to this group after informing their name.

If you don't want to ask for the name again, just remove the link from the Informed Name category or lower the card until the message flow starts in the first "Send message" card
63fee139-f00e-4b5a-b4a8-935535ce09a8.title: Split by group

69abfbd6-e457-451e-bca5-38cc5cc9c833.body: Here we update the contact field "name" and it can be seen in the Studio > Contacts module
69abfbd6-e457-451e-bca5-38cc5cc9c833.title: Update contact

76fcd361-ae53-47f7-86aa-0e1b3c7ec8c8.body:
We delete the Contact Code whenever the user informs their name because we created the possibility of more than 1 lead arriving through the channel.

This means that if the user informs that their name has changed, a new contact code will always be generated to register in the Omie API.
76fcd361-ae53-47f7-86aa-0e1b3c7ec8c8.title: nCod

7e207b33-679c-41fd-af4d-a1fde0396bba.body:
The No Response category is used when the flow continues without the user answering the question. It's usually used to not leave the user stuck in a question.

In addition, we add the user to the "Conversation ended" group so that before sending another message or entering another flow we can check if the user is in that group and avoid sending messages.
7e207b33-679c-41fd-af4d-a1fde0396bba.title: No Response category

b7e2987e-79af-4cc3-b44d-3ea6ff72f024.body:
This card serves to stop the flow of messages and wait for a moment for the user to respond.

It's very important to be used to make the conversation more human.

Remember that you can click on the option "Continue when there's no response..." and choose the time you want to wait.

Inside the "Wait for response" card we can also create rules for when, when the user responds, already check if there's any word or if it's a text.
b7e2987e-79af-4cc3-b44d-3ea6ff72f024.title: Wait for response

e922c5c2-ad35-482a-8655-07435c3e2139.body: Here we treat the exception for when the user doesn't type a text, possibly having sent a photo of their document, etc.
e922c5c2-ad35-482a-8655-07435c3e2139.title: Other

ff7c6bad-90a1-4867-99dc-5f2ac3dad3e6.body:
The Close category is used when the message flow continues without the user having responded to the question. It is typically used to prevent the user from being stuck on a question.

Additionally, we add the user to the "Conversation ended" group because before sending another message or entering another message flow, we can check if the user is in this group and avoid sending messages.
ff7c6bad-90a1-4867-99dc-5f2ac3dad3e6.title: Close category

actions.text: Can you confirm for me, is @contact.name your name?
I'd like to get to know you better 😊
I need you to send me in text format...
Please, what is your full name?
Due to lack of response, I ended this conversation. But when you want, just talk to me 😉
Alright, when you want, just talk to me 😉

0d0083b2-6cf7-4907-bcaa-9ebcf0df5258.body:
This card is used to check if the user is in the Conversation Ended group, if so, the flow does not continue. Now if the user is not in that group, it will pass through the Other category and continue in the flow.

It is important to remember that the user is only placed in the Conversation Ended group if they want to end or stay inactive.
0d0083b2-6cf7-4907-bcaa-9ebcf0df5258.title: Divide by Group Section

4add01c1-1ae5-41b9-8cdf-aa84f8e29076.body:
This is the main messaging flow for capturing data. Therefore, it should be started when you need to collect the name, phone number and email of a user.

In this flow we use the card "Enter a flow" to organize the steps and types of questions such as name, phone number and email. But the flow you should use is "Captura de Leads - Omie".
4add01c1-1ae5-41b9-8cdf-aa84f8e29076.title: Initial Information

693fdf1e-9eb4-4c3c-80db-8a1a68dd6fd3.body: In this flow we include the opportunity in the Omie api.
693fdf1e-9eb4-4c3c-80db-8a1a68dd6fd3.title: Include Opportunity

753bcb91-f5c6-4836-81db-f6c49ef1bb1e.body: In this flow we include the contact in the Omie api.
753bcb91-f5c6-4836-81db-f6c49ef1bb1e.title: Include Contact

8c6966cf-0a04-4478-bd31-c2d39e23c4db.body:
In this messaging flow we use the card "Enter a flow" to organize the structure of our questions. 

The card "Enter a flow" simply directs the user to another messaging flow in milliseconds and immediately executes the action of that other messaging flow.

Therefore, for organizational purposes, we ask for name, phone number and email, each in its respective messaging flow.
8c6966cf-0a04-4478-bd31-c2d39e23c4db.title: Enter a Flow

a0889d78-48bf-4946-b208-8840ff6b6541.body: Add your email to receive a notification every time a lead is created
a0889d78-48bf-4946-b208-8840ff6b6541.title: Send Email

a507503c-2b76-443f-bdc9-11774aa9d149.body:
Feedback message to the user.

It can be removed or changed if you prefer.
a507503c-2b76-443f-bdc9-11774aa9d149.title: Send Message

ac6454c0-fe74-4b63-9058-fc552f57cee7.body:
This card is used to check if the user is in the Conversation Ended group, if so, the messaging flow does not continue. Now if the user is not in that group, it will pass through the Other category and continue in the messaging flow.

It is important to remember that the user is only placed in the Conversation Ended group if they want to end or stay inactive.
ac6454c0-fe74-4b63-9058-fc552f57cee7.title: Divide by Group Section

d5e6d883-3c5c-41b8-875c-30f5edc1fad0.body:
This card is used to add the user who completed sending information to a group called "Complete Lead".

You can view all the people who are in that group by accessing the Module Dashboard > Contacts > Filter by Group Lead Complete in the bottom left corner of the Screen.

You can also actively send messages to all the people who are inside that group.
d5e6d883-3c5c-41b8-875c-30f5edc1fad0.title: Add to a Group

actions.text: I informed about your interest to our responsible 🤝 Wait, one of our consultants will contact you

actions.body:
The contact @contact.name has just been registered as a lead via the Omie API.

Phone: @fields.phone

Email: @fields.email
actions.subject: New Lead Captured via Chatbot - OMIE API @globals.nome_da_empresa
